resources.string: Have an account already? Log in.
Don\'t have an account? Sign up.
Vegetarian food does not contain any meat (includes meat, poultry, seafood, insects, gelatin, or stocks from animals).
Vegan food does not contain any animal products. Food that contains meat, dairy, eggs, or honey are not vegan.

Kosher food is any food or beverage that Jewish dietary laws allow a person to eat. Kosher certified foods are often labeled on the packaging. For more information, visit https://oukosher.org/the-kosher-primer/.

Halal food is any food or beverage that Islamic dietary laws allows a person to eat. Halal foods are often labeled on the packaging. For more information, visit https://www.icv.org.au/about/about-islam-overview/what-is-halal-a-guide-for-non-muslims/
